mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into orders (id, petId, userId, quantity, shipDate, status, complete) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{petId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shipDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{complete,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update orders set petId = #{petId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userId = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shipDate = #{shipDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, complete = #{complete,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, petId, userId, quantity, shipDate, status, complete from orders
